gameRecap.title: Game Recap: Clippers 122, Rockets 116
gameRecap.excerpt: The Clippers overcome a 20-point deficit as they come back and defeat the Rockets, 122-116. Kawhi Leonard led the way for the Clippers with 28 points, six rebounds and seven assists, while Paul George (21 points, seven rebounds) and James Harden (21 points, five rebounds, seven assists) added a combined 42 points in the victory. Alperen Sengun tallied 23 points, 19 rebounds and a career-high 14 assists for the Rockets in the losing effort, his second triple-double of the season and fourth of his career. The Clippers improve to 40-21 on the season, while the Rockets fall to 27-35.
